channel.title: How to make a skillcape emote(by a command)turn you into a NPC? [PI 317]
channel.description: im attempting to add a dungeoneering cape emote using my own custom NPCs for the emotes instead of the 600(whatever) revision npcs. im going to make a command instead of clicking the skillcape button to do the emote. can anyone help do this? or give me a base to work from?
